extendedInfo.description: doubleTwist Widgets brings you a lovely collection of widgets, live wallpapers and more! If you use and love doubleTwist Player or doubleTwist Alarm Clock you'll love the expanded functionality and personalization that doubleTwist Widgets offers to these apps. Even if you're not already a Player or Alarm Clock user, you'll love the new live wallpaper included in doubleTwist Widgets.doubleTwist Widgets includes:1) World Clock live wallpaper with Alarm Clock integration: This hi-res rendered, slowly panning globe is both beautiful and calming. The flip-clock can be positioned vertically prior to setting the live wallpaper. Additionally, when alarm is set in doubleTwist Alarm Clock app, a bell icon will be visible.2) Small (4x1), Medium (4x2) and Large (4x3) new music widgets ("Modern" vs. the existing "Classic" widgets included with the doubleTwist Player)doubleTwist Widgets will operate as an expansion-pack for other doubleTwist offerings, so this is the app to get if you use and love doubleTwist's other apps. Oh, and did we mention all the widgets and wallpapers in doubleTwist Widgets are free?Also, stay in the loop on all that doubleTwist has to offer with the included doubleTwist Store.doubleTwist Widgets is handmade with â¤ in San Francisco.If you have comments or feedback on our app, or need additional support, please visit http://doubletwist.com/contact/. Thanks!Use of this app is subject to the doubleTwist Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: http://doubletwist.com/legal/

reviews.title: Please consider this
reviews.comment: I love the wallpaper and the widgets. But I can\'t stand the clock on the wallpaper. Can you please give me the option to remove the clock from the lwp? It\'s the only good world map lwp I can find. Would be 5 stars.
reviews.author: Jordan Steelflex

reviews.title: Widget takes up too much space!
reviews.comment: My only request is that the size of the widget is shrunk. It takes up space that it\'s not using. I can only put one more small widget or 4 shortcuts at the bottom.   Other than that great app.
reviews.author: Tasia Williams

reviews.title: What\'s the point?
reviews.comment: As live wallpaper can\'t be set as just lock screen wallpaper what\'s the point of a clock as live wallpaper as it just get\'s in the way as home screen wall paper?!
reviews.author: David Wallis

reviews.title: Htc one
reviews.comment: Crash all the time, doesn\'t display cover art, stock widgets do and these don\'t all the time. Wish this was fixed coz i love these widgets. Please fix.

reviews.title: No lock screen widgets for 4.2?
reviews.comment: I\'m running 4.2.2 and would\'ve loved to see some lock screen widgets as oppose to the pop up on the lock screen. :(

reviews.title: Really good looking widgets
reviews.comment: Love doubletwist! I only wish these widgets could be included with the original app, other than that, no problems. By the way, lol to the thunderbolt owner: \"it\'s an ad for three apps, doesn\'t even do anything\"... Apparently that guy doesn\'t know how to access widgets on his own phone; maybe he can borrow his grandmother\'s iPhone.
reviews.author: chase anderson

reviews.title: Meh.
reviews.comment: Bugs... made w/love in San Francisco. TIP: take a break from your lovefest & look into hiring some competent coders & also maybe  research this: \'business ethics\'.  I bought the alarm clock app... it IS one of the nicer alarm apps but this \'widget\' app will not even launch on my Samsung GS2.  Sneaking in the \'Doubletwist Store\' was quite dishonest, you guys must admit, eh? Really?!  When I saw that I thought, oh gee, one more app that my kids will enjoy playing with (& likely installing new apps from). THX!
reviews.author: Fred Baker

reviews.title: Good start!
reviews.comment: Needs some more functional widgets; for example, I would love a toggle for enabling/disabling Air Twist. Beautiful UI and great otherwise. Thank you!
reviews.author: Ricardo Leyva
